verbs.description: Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer [V: will] unveil a new wax figure of first lady Melania Trump at Madame Tussauds New York on Wednesday .

[ARG0: Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: unveil] [ARG1: a new wax figure of first lady Melania Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at Madame Tussauds New York] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] .
